pages.title: Spiny Softshell Turtle
pages.text: The spiny softshell turtle ($(o)Apalone spinifera$()) is a species of softshell turtle, one of the largest freshwater turtle species in North America.

pages.title: Spiny Softshell Turtle
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:cod$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
